* [ ] Composition over inheritance
* [ ] Single Responsibility Principle followed
* [ ] No speculative features added
* [ ] No `TODO`, `FIXME`, `pass`, `...`, or `NotImplementedError`
* [ ] No docstrings that restate the signature
* [ ] No abstractions without 2+ implementations
* [ ] No defensive checks for impossible conditions
* [ ] All dependencies are constructor-injected
* [ ] No module-level singleton imports in services
* [ ] Pure functions have no I/O
* [ ] All data classes are frozen
* [ ] Only specific exceptions are caught
* [ ] Generic exception handling only at API boundaries
* [ ] No PII/credentials in logs

* [ ] All I/O is async
